hiveArticle.title: Photoristic Travel to Mysore Palace
hiveArticle.body:
I might have shared a few photos of Mysore palace, but today lets go inside the Mysore Palace and see how beautiful it is from Inside as well as from outside.  So since Mysore Palace is #1 attraction in Mysore,  a lot of people tend to visit it and thus it remains crowded most of the time. If you want to take photos or do photoshoots inside you need to literally wait. 

![IMG_1434_01.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVQvVmz5B3victeWM4A9UgkmBaUmhSxCzEbKTuqyCEEjE)

It is just 2.5 km from the railway station, so you can reach Mysore palace from Railway Station by Auto, Car or even you can hire a bicycle.  Also, Mysore Palace is the venue for famous Mysore Dasara where you can see a large possession happening at this time of the year.

The architecture of the palace is a mix of Hindu, Muslim and Rajput styles which states that it is built on Unity between all the religions in India. The palace is also surrounded by a large garden thus you will find greenery too if you are planning to do photoshoot out there. The palace is also known as Amba Vilas Palace.

The palace can be reached from Four Arched Gates. The palace is made up of stone granite, pink marble and the main building of the palace is three stories. The general entry of the palace is from the South Gate. 

![IMG_1447.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmaM44g5gVXnGYRJpLFcoZGDSBGNBQghik9SM6YxRwmig2)

This is known as the Kalyana Mantapa or Marriage Hall which is one of the first hall you sill see and I am sure it will surely leave you speechless. 

![IMG_1448.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmPYEFQPVQAWNhj5cbqUMk1cUFJq7fmXU524xiZi4AZnst)

![IMG_1451.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmR6ZNP5bdG2YqRRHCtuujGdPWrFNCcL9rje2tYSSMXNq4)

A Gate, though nothing to talk about it much we were not allowed to go inside of it.

![IMG_1453.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmRZCKGyddmAmKxwnnmrKUjLacwWoMATL2CJ4mgbzAj4on)

This is the area for a commonplace inside the Palace, which we can say a Private Darbaar of the King where he will do a recreational activity.

![IMG_1460.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmfEnCbZ8v6qUKLqsorwM4FgDDQFci6wwbTmfN7jaYtDoz)

Few more photos of Inside and Outside of Mysore Palace.
